name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed unauthorized scripts on a web server, exfiltrating sensitive data.

action--c53b2804-1034-4a9e-8536-9a9b69c5.name: Kill malicious process
action--c53b2804-1034-4a9e-8536-9a9b69c5.description: Terminate the unauthorized script that was executed.

action--2e4b568d-0955-4ee7-b8b1-edf02bd3.name: Isolate affected host
action--2e4b568d-0955-4ee7-b8b1-edf02bd3.description: Drop all incoming traffic from the compromised host to prevent further damage.

loop--a6673ec9-5cd4-4393-8d56-9a6de265ab.name: Scan network for suspicious hosts
loop--a6673ec9-5cd4-4393-8d56-9a6de265ab.description: Repeatedly scan the network to detect any unauthorized scripts or vulnerable hosts.

action--a6673ec9-5cd4-4393-8d56-9a6de265.name: Scan network for other instances
action--a6673ec9-5cd4-4393-8d56-9a6de265.description: Perform a network scan to find other instances of unauthorized activity.
